name: Camping Nightmares
description:
Camping Nightmares was created for the One Resource Jam 2017

It is my first game i ever made.

In Camping Nightmares you are a lone wanderer who is camping in the wild and gets ambushed by evil spirits or something.

Shooting consumes mana, getting hit also consumes mana

Made with Godot

Mac Version is untested.
